app_description: Minimalist drawing app. Supports Apple Pencil new old both portrait landscape iPad multitasking standard iOS share the latest devices. Pick up use. Like a white board or scratch paper. Features Apple Pencil support iOS 14 Widget support to show case your latest or favorite drawing on home screen Draw in either landscape or portrait Multiple windows and multitasking support on iPadOS iPad Standard iOS share action button copy save send to other messaging social apps Saving square images for Instagram submission Useful for Jotting down notes Illustrate something to friends coworkers through drawing Draw sketch something casually Practice some basic drawing skills drawing straight lines parallel lines circles faces etc Making a positive impact Super Simple Draw started as a way to reduce the use of papers because we believe that the current environmental degradation and the climate change are pressing issues that demand urgent actions. Now we took a step further: for every 2000 lines you draw we plant a tree through a partnership with Trees for the Future. Learn more at https: trees.theiosapp.com The more you draw the more trees we can plant together.
